t:
I finally
make the call to the police.

Clutching my torn clothes
with one hand, I sob out my
location into the phone.




The torn shirt was a fantastic idea on my part. Now the court will never believe him, and I can finally have the custody of the children.
c:
Now I just need to make sure this place looks ransacked.



Write an ode to the #silentnight.  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





Only 47% of domestic violence cases (under 498A) are registered in India. Out of this, around 14% are fake, a misuse of the law. Wouldn't it be better, if this 14% could be filled up with the unreported 53%?





#fake #harrasment #police #children #custody #misuse
